fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sron.diffusion.components

Class DiffusionNodePlugin

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractPlugin
      • fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sron.plugins.SRONNodePlugin
        • fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sron.diffusion.components.DiffusionNodePlugin
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.PluginI, ManagementI, MessagingI, java.io.Serializable

    public class DiffusionNodePlugin
extends SRONNodePlugin
    The class DiffusionNodePlugin implements the plug-in for a ring overlay network node performing broadcasting and point-to-point message passing.

    Description

    The class merely implements the abstract methods of the plug-in SRONNodePlugin.

    Implementation Invariants

     invariant       true        // no more invariant

    Invariants

     invariant       true        // no more invariant

    Created on : 2019-04-08

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • DiffusionNodePlugin

        public DiffusionNodePlugin(int nbThreads)
        create a new diffusion node plug-in which will create and use a pool of threads on the owner component with the given number of threads.

        Contract

         pre     nbThreads > 0
 post    true        // no postcondition.
        Parameters:
        nbThreads - number of threads in the pool that will execute the plug-in methods.
